uploadProposal.title: Submit your Snapshot proposal
uploadProposal.description: To submit your Snapshot proposal for voting, please follow the steps below. This process allows us to retrieve and display your proposal details, including the vote name, title, purpose, and voting options, to all eligible voters.

steps.1: Find your proposal's IPFS hash on Snapshot. It is usually displayed under the "Information" section on the proposal page.
steps.2: Paste the IPFS hash or link in the field below. This lets us connect the proposal to the page and enables community members to vote as soon as the voting phase begins.

uploadProposal.uploadToValidate: Upload your proposal to validate content
uploadProposal.validating: Your vote proposal is currently being validated and parsed.
uploadProposal.successValidation: Your proposal is now ready for linking.
uploadProposal.proposalHash: Put an IPFS hash of your proposal from Snapshot

successProposal.title: Proposal submission successful
successProposal.description: Your Snapshot proposal has been successfully linked to the page. Other community members can now view the details of your vote and participate as soon as the voting phase starts.

voteOnProposal.title: Cast your vote
voteOnProposal.description: A new proposal is on the table, and it's your opportunity to weigh in. Dive into the specifics, evaluate the options, and submit your vote to help guide our collective path forward. Your involvement is key to our community's success and progress. Let's shape our future together.

formPlaceholders.email: Enter your email to count your vote

formPlaceholders.name: Enter full name of the page
